welcome_message_body: Welcome to Pompano Beach, where sun-kissed beaches, vibrant culture, and delicious seafood await you. We invite you to explore and enjoy all the charm and beauty our city has to offer!

restaurants.name: Houston's

restaurants.address: 2821 E Atlantic Blvd, Pompano Beach, FL 33062

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pompano Beach Airport houses all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Pompano Beach Airport is exclusively for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This is the main terminal at Fort Lauderdale–Hollywood International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves international flights and houses the airport's customs and immigration facilities.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights, with a focus on low-cost carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights, with a focus on major airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a login and may have limited bandwidth.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at North Perry Airport serves as the primary hub for commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at North Perry Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing amenities and services for pilots and passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Opa Locka Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Opa Locka Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Wifi is available throughout the airport and is free for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Palm Beach International Airport is the primary hub for all commercial flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Palm Beach International Airport is primarily used for domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by selecting the network and agreeing to the terms and conditions.
